parsetree.*:
<root>[[Category:Scripting_Commands_Arma_3]]

<template lineStart="1"><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.38</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Mods and Addons </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns modDir of the mod that given config class was loaded from. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''configSourceMod''' config</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> config: [[Config]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[configSourceMod]] ([[configFile]] >> "CfgVehicles" >> "Heli_Transport_04_base_F"); //Returns "heli" </code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[configSourceMod]] ([[configFile]] >> "CfgVehicles" >> "Car"); //Returns "A3" </code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[configFile]], [[configSourceModList]], [[modParams]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template></root>
